resources.string: Confirm
The email address you entered has not been recognized and may be incorrect. Continue account creation with this email address?
...and a Master Password. The one to rule them all.
Need help? See our tips
Create your Master Password
Note: For your security, we don’t store your Master Password. Make sure you remember it!
Let\'s start with your email...
We don\'t need much to get the ball rolling.
Got it. Can you type it one more time?
Just making sure you\'re happy with it.
Type your Master Password again
I’d like to receive emails with tips and special offers for Dashlane.
The email address that you entered appears invalid. Please check it, and try again.
You need to enter an email address to proceed.
There already is an account with that email address. Try logging in, or create an account with another email address.
Unable to verify username with Dashlane at this time. Please try again later.
This doesn\'t match your Master Password. Please try again.
Create a strong Master Password
Using symbols, single digits, and uppercase letters does not make your password stronger.
Use multiple words, and avoid common phrases like \"atthebeach.\"
Please agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
I agree with the %1$s and %2$s.
Terms of Service
Privacy Policy
I agree
Make Dashlane fast and easy
Biometric unlock
Unlock Dashlane with one look or touch
Master Password reset
In case you forget it
How it works
Back

If you turn on Biometric unlock or Master Password reset we\'ll encrypt your Master Password and store it on your device. It remains encrypted from everyone, including us.

Note: Master Password reset needs Biometric unlock enabled to work.
Master Password reset needs Biometric unlock enabled to work.
Continue
